description:
Are you in for a surprise? Amaze yourself with this application.

MindReader application works by utilizing human touch interface. When you rest your finger on the screen, mindreader detects electro-static waves generated by your brain's neurons. As you keep concentrating, this application will run the math and analyze your thinking impulses. Really?! 

Enjoy and amaze your friends and family with the math trick of mind reader. 

CodeMighty Software Solutions www.codemightysoftware.webs.com
